tiles.title: First Avenue
tiles.text: You just paid the lunch at the Double Dragon. The cashier thanks you while cleaning a golden lucky cat. You are now off the restaurant. A stream of yellow cabs passes by.

tiles.title: On a taxi in First Avenue
tiles.text:
-Take me to the end of First Avenue. You just say -Yes sir.
You are in the middle of a traffic jam. The stream goes slowly.
A kebak kiosk on the right. The man at the kiosk is preparing a frankfurt for a customer. He adds some mustard, take a couple greens and gives the hotdog.

tiles.title: A couple blocks ahead..
tiles.text: A barber shop is full of customers. Some are sitting inside, others are standing outside. A cleaner is working onthe window of an hardware store.

tiles.title: 1st Ave / E 25st
tiles.text: In the middle of ywo large brick buildings. Red lights, the car stops gently while the driver's phone is ringing. A middle-east melody plays in the car. Why he doesn't take the phone?

tiles.title: 1st Ave / E 25st
tiles.text: The phone is still ringing. The driver doesn't even look at the phone.
